Package tp_ed.capturetheflag.game

Class Algorithm

java.lang.Object
tp_ed.capturetheflag.game.Algorithm
public class Algorithm extends Object
Represents an algorithm used by a bot in the game. It defines the strategy a bot uses to move, either randomly, guarding the flag, or finding the shortest path to the enemy's flag location.

    Constructs an Algorithm with the specified network and algorithm type.

  • Constructor Details

    • Algorithm

      public Algorithm(Network<Integer> network, AlgorithmType type)
      Constructs an Algorithm with the specified network and algorithm type.
      Parameters:
      network - The game's network (map).
      type - The type of algorithm to be used.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public AlgorithmType getType()
      Returns the type of the algorithm.
      Returns:
      The algorithm type.

    • execute

      public Iterator<Integer> execute(int currentLocation, int enemyFlagLocation, int teamFlagLocation, ArrayUnorderedList<Integer> locationsToAvoid)
      Executes the algorithm based on its type.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The current location of the bot.
      enemyFlagLocation - The location of the enemy's flag.
      teamFlagLocation - The location of the team's flag.
      locationsToAvoid - Locations to avoid during movement.
      Returns:
      An iterator over the path decided by the algorithm.

    • findShortestPath

      public Iterator<Integer> findShortestPath(int startVertex, int endVertex, ArrayUnorderedList<Integer> locationsToAvoid)
      Finds the shortest path from a start vertex to an end vertex, avoiding occupied locations. This method utilizes the network's shortest path algorithm, considering the locations to avoid.
      Parameters:
      startVertex - The starting vertex in the network (bot's location).
      endVertex - The end vertex for the path (enemy's flag location).
      locationsToAvoid - A list of vertices to avoid in the path.
      Returns:
      An iterator over the sequence of vertices in the shortest path.

    • moveRandomly

      public Iterator<Integer> moveRandomly(int currentLocation, ArrayUnorderedList<Integer> locationsToAvoid)
      Moves randomly from the current location, avoiding occupied locations. This method selects a random adjacent vertex that is not in the locations to avoid.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The current location of the bot.
      locationsToAvoid - A list of locations to avoid.
      Returns:
      An iterator over the next location chosen randomly.

    • guardFlag

      public Iterator<Integer> guardFlag(int currentLocation, int teamFlagLocation, ArrayUnorderedList<Integer> locationsToAvoid)
      Guards the flag by staying close to it, moving to an adjacent location if not already in one. This method aims to move the bot to a location adjacent to the flag, avoiding occupied locations.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The current location of the bot.
      teamFlagLocation - The location of team's flag.
      locationsToAvoid - A list of locations to avoid.
      Returns:
      An iterator over the next location chosen to guard the flag.
